description.general: While cruising to @system, your ship encouters a swarm of space gem beetles.
description.success: They are able to eat @number1 gems.
description.failure: Luckily, you don't have any gems on this trip. You fly on through them unnoticed.

description.general: You find a mad scientist that stowed away on your ship. He says in exchange for safe passage to @system and @money credits, he will upgrade one of your ship's weapon slots.
description.success: Happily taking the money, the crazy looking scientist upgrades your @old1 to a @new1.
description.failure: Refusing this crazy man's offer, you keep him contained until you reach @system.
description.money: Because you didn't have enough money to match his terms, you sheepishly offer to drop him off at the nearest planet.
description.noweapons: However, once you tell the scientist that you have nothing to improve, he requests to be transffered to the nearest ship that will take him as soon as possible.
description.maxweapons: However, once you tell the scientist that you have the best equipment available, he begins to act frightened and pleads that you drop him off at the nearest planet.

description.other: Any text needed for other cases.
